## Worker
Member of *Myrmicinae* with two segments to waist and sting present.

Aggressive species with two subcastes, major caste with large heart shaped head and minor caste with small ovoid head. [Mesosoma](#glossary) circular with short [propodeal spines](#glossary). [Postpetiole](#glossary) oval.

Predator and scavenger, as well as attending aphids for honey dew.

## Nest
Large supercolonies with many queens in rotting logs, underneath rocks and pavements in relatively moist and disturbed habitats. No established colonies reported since 1970s. Pupae naked.
